name: Age of Empires II: The Age of Kings

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Microsoft Games/Age of Empires II/empires2.EXE

content:
files:
- patch: http://soldierofortune2.free.fr/aoe2/aokpatch2a-crk.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Microsoft Games/Age of Empires II/empires2.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: patch
- task:
    executable: $CACHE/aokpatch2a-crk.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
requires: age-of-empires-ii-the-age-of-k-cd
